column1: # global_title: CSEM2 in the region Africa at a resolution of 2 points per degree and 10 km
# global_summary: CSEM2 in the region Africa at a resolution of 2 points per degree and 10 km. The second-generation Collaborative Seismic Earth Model (CSEM2) is a global
column2: multi-scale Earth model developed using full-waveform inversion. The term 'multi-scale' reflects the varying sizes of the inversion domains. CSEM2 integrates information from both global and regional inversions into a unified framework. For user-specific domains and spatial resolution
The Collaborative Seismic Earth Model: Generation 2

column1: # VSV_long_name: Wave speed of vertically polarized S-waves
# VSH_long_name: Wave speed of horizontally polarized S-waves
# VPV_long_name: P-wave velocity in vertical propagation direction
# VPH_long_name: P-wave velocity in horizontal propagation direction
